npc_types.name: Wandering Sage
dialogues: Greetings, traveler. I seek a powerful item that was lost in these depths.
Hello adventurer, I have a task for you if you're brave enough.
Welcome, hero. I need someone to retrieve something precious to me.
Oh, a visitor! Perhaps you can assist me with a small matter.
Adventurer, I sense great potential in you. Will you hear my request?
Ahh, a fellow explorer! I have knowledge that might interest you.
Young champion, I've been waiting for someone capable to arrive.
Traveler, you appear to have the skills I require for a quest.

quests.name: Retrieve the Lost Trophy
quests.description: I need you to defeat a Dragon and bring me its trophy. In return, I'll give you this Flame Sword.

quests.name: Recover the Ancient Artifact
quests.description: Defeat an Ogre and bring me its trophy. I'll reward you with this Frost Helm.

quests.name: Collect Rare Materials
quests.description: Bring me proof of defeating a Demon, and I'll give you this Lightning Blade.

quests.name: Prove Your Worth
quests.description: Only by defeating an Ancient Guardian can you earn this Healing Amulet.

npc_types.name: Lost Merchant
dialogues: Oh thank goodness! Another soul! Would you be interested in trading?
Friend, I seem to have misplaced my wares. Could you assist me?
Traveler, I have rare goods to trade if you have the coin.
Adventurer, I carry items that might aid your journey.
Welcome, friend. I offer unique provisions for those brave enough to venture deeper.
A customer! I have many exotic items from distant lands.
Hail, explorer! Need supplies for your journey?
Good to see a friendly face. Interested in quality goods?

quests.name: Trade Valuable Items
quests.description: I'll trade you this Greater Health Potion for that Golden Key you have.

quests.name: Special Order
quests.description: That Enchanted Crystal would complement my collection perfectly. I can offer this Power Elixir in return.

npc_types.name: Trapped Scholar
dialogues: Please, you must help me! I've been trapped here for days!
Adventurer, I possess knowledge that could aid your quest.
A friend! I've discovered secrets about this place that might interest you.
Traveler, I've been studying these ruins. Would you listen to my findings?
Thank the stars! Someone who might help me escape this place.
Fellow seeker of truth! I've uncovered mysteries about this dungeon.
Explorer, I have maps and information about the deeper levels.
At last, one who might assist me in my research!

quests.name: Rescue Mission
quests.description: I need an Iron Key to unlock these bindings. In gratitude, I offer this Magic Staff.

quests.name: Information Exchange
quests.description: That Mana Potion would help my studies. Allow me to give you this Robe in return.

npc_types.name: Friendly Ghost
dialogues: Do not fear, traveler. I mean you no harm.
Welcome, living one. It's been ages since I've spoken to the living.
A warm soul! How refreshing in this cold place.
Kind spirit, would you help an old soul find peace?
Greeting, mortal. I have wisdom to share with those who listen.
Peace be with you, adventurer. I am bound to this place but not to silence.
Welcome, friend. Though I am but a shade, I have much to offer.
A living visitor! I have watched over this place for many years.

quests.name: Spiritual Aid
quests.description: Bring me proof of defeating a fellow spirit, and I'll guide you to this Dagger.

quests.name: Restoration
quests.description: If you have a Holy Symbol, I can reveal the location of Chain Mail.
